item.title: About us
item.description:
We are group of backend php developers. Currently we have some projects, but we can spend our time for remote projects in freelance part time. We are situated in Ukraine.

Our specialization:

Backend:

PHP: Magento 2, Yii, Yii 2, Joomla CMS, PrestaShop, Kohana, Plain PHP.

Web Solutions: E-stores, Real Estate Sites, Payment system integranion, FaceBook applications, Business card sites, Mobile Web Applications, REST API, Sphinx

Work with Frontend:

JQuery, jQuery Mobile, JS templite frameworks, AJAX, CSS, Responsive Design, Twitter Bootstrap

We are happy to answer your questions. cheerymagicsoftware@gmail.com
